name: Metu Caligine
description:
Kill victims of experiments with melee weapons or firearms, (you must find them) it can save your life, but remember the ammo can run out, an accurate headshot will solve this problem, also use auxiliary items, flashlights and do not forget about the batteries, they can run out at the most inopportune moment! inspect every room, maybe there are shields for turning on the electricity (this will obviously be very useful). Also, do not forget to take food and various medications, they will help you, as well as bandages to stop bleeding. They will not give you mercy, try to get out of this nightmare, examine objects for secrets or passwords, as well as keys and pass cards, not everything is as simple as it seems. Explore these strange places and try not to die quickly and get out alive !!

Go through mysterious levels and try to dodge and avoid fear, or vice versa attack and exterminate them. Now everything is important from any sound to a torch. keep your finger on the trigger and try to survive ... or will you die anyway?
try it to the end. Look into the eyes of the nightmare of all mankind and feel the vibrations and cold hand of an old woman with a scythe.


This is our first game made on our own, it is not much short but interesting, our team will improve and make games better and better in the future. This is our first product
